summary: Han Solo Has A Stupid Idea
title: Han Solo Has A Stupid Idea
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2KVwLyw

by rosestone

Being a Force-Sensitive smuggler on the run from any law enforcement that might happen to be in the area is an expensive job. Unfortunately, Han Solo doesn’t have any credits. Fortunately, someone’s willing to give him quite a lot of credits to take some cargo from Kashyyyk to a drop-point in the middle of nowhere. Unfortunately, Kashyyyk isn’t a very friendly place for someone who’s Force-Sensitive.
Fortunately…
Han will definitely think of an upside to this. Eventually.

Words: 10796, Chapters: 3/3, Language: English

Series: Part 3 of Solo

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Trek: The Original Series, Star Wars: Rebellion Era - All Media Types
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences

summary: Star Wars ships as colors (8/?) - Finnrose Green- Green, the color of life, renewal, nature, and energy, is associated with...
caption:
Star Wars ships as colors (8/?) - Finnrose

Green- Green, the color of life, renewal, nature, and energy, is associated with meanings of growth, harmony, freshness, safety, fertility, and environment. The color green has healing power and is understood to be the most restful and relaxing color for the human eye to view. With the color green’s association with renewal, growth, and hope, often green stands for both a lack of experience and need for growth.  Green is a color that helps alleviate anxiety, depression, and nervousness.
(source)

More ships as colors!

summary: Vader-Shaped Manifestations of Whatsit (Part Two: The Crimson Forever)
title: Vader-Shaped Manifestations of Whatsit (Part Two: The Crimson Forever)
body:
@teagrl , @threadsketchier , whoever else might be interested: Marvel Star Wars! Luke’s powers being weird! Woo! Part One’s back here.

So skip a whole lot of issues ahead to number 50, The Crimson Forever, a double-sized issue. The Empire Strikes came out in 1978; this is from 1981, so it’s after ESB and Han Solo is an expensive coffee table, Lando and Chewie are questing to find him and frequently putting that search on hold so they can costar, and Carmine Infantino’s signature pencilling style has given way to a succession of other, more light-handed artists.

So in this issue, Luke’s led a team of people to investigate a drifting Star Destroyer.

see this is why they decide to call this disease the Crimson Forever. Oh, comic books.

Here’s where the Vader visions come into it.

Gotta love how post-ESB pre-RotJ comics hedged around not knowing if Vader was telling the truth, and also managed to touch on things that would be relevant in the upcoming film. Anyway, consequently:

Leia, Lando, and Chewie then tackle the menace of this bizarre jewel-based disease. It’s. Look if I get into the weeds, it’s pretty ridiculous. We’ll just leave it as the Crimson Forever isn’t a real disease. Fight it like a disease and you die, let it wash over you and you go into suspended animation so deep that sensors just think you’re dead. So, after they get things solved:

Sorry, all his dudes. You didn’t have Vader-shaped manifestations of disease to show you that you should have just let it ‘kill’ you, so you died for real.

I will return with the third and final part, The Dream.

summary: The Life You Always Dreamt Of
title: The Life You Always Dreamt Of
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2uwKGA2

by Anonymous

Ben Solo has always followed his obligations. He is expected to take over his family’s enterprise, Skywalker Steel. He is expected to marry a reputable girl who will make him a fitting wife. He is expected to do as he’s told without question. He had long accepted his fate in this regard, until he met Rey. Her presence in his life was like that of a storm, blowing through his calm existence over the better part of a decade and leaving him wrecked on the other side. She was not his, but if he had his way… she would be.

Prompt for the Reylo Summer Fic Exchange for avidvampirehunter.
“In 19th century London, Rey is a poor street rat desperate for someone to see her as something more. Little does she know that the mysterious and powerful Skywalker heir has set his sights on on her to become his wife, and will do everything in that power to make her his.”

Words: 7642, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Rey (Star Wars), Ben Solo
  • Relationships: Rey & Ben Solo
  • Additional Tags: Skywalker Steel, Rey the Maid, Heir Ben, Age Difference, Mutual Pining, friends first, virgins, First Kiss, Angst and Fluff, Alternate Universe - Victorian, smut at the end


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2uwKGA2

summary: “If we live through this...remind me to thank you.”   Drawn for a Star Wars - Anastasia AU fic I just started working on and...
caption:
“If we live through this…remind me to thank you.” 

Drawn for a Star Wars - Anastasia AU fic I just started working on and hopefully will finish within the foreseeable future. 

- Lando being a con man with Han Solo and taking advantage of Luke’s likeness to the lost prince and his desperate desire to find his family. Although, once the truth starts to clear, his feelings for the would-be prince conflict with his original goals. - 

my posted piece for this AU
